Html:
Hi

i'm fairly new to Prism and silverlight, and so I'm wondering if it is possible to write a custom command for a System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse in silverlight?

 

Thanks

Hi,

Silverlight 4 includes commanding support for ButtonBase classes, but the Ellipse class does not derives from ButtonBase.

That said, Prism provides you guidance for extending commad support , so you could use this as a reference. For more information you could take a look at the following links:

  • Commands, see the Extending Command Support section
  • PRISM Commanding with UserControl

Hope this helps.

Fernando Antivero
http://blogs.southworks.net/fantivero
